summary: Create immutable logging bucket and tighten IAM policy from wildcard to scoped read-only; no deletes.
rationale: No public access, encryption implied; IAM tightened; no data plane exposure; no destroys.

highlights.identity: IAM narrowed from * to SecurityAudit role.
highlights.keys: Ensure bucket SSE and KMS key if required by policy.
highlights.network: S3 is public service; bucket public access blocked.
highlights.data: Audit logs only; Object Lock optional.
highlights.policy: Aligns with FedRAMP logging baseline; no exceptions required.

rollback: If issues, delete new bucket (no prod data) and revert policy change.
observability: CloudTrail + S3 access logs; verify no public access via AWS Config rule s3-bucket-public-read-prohibited.
